policies.description: Explains how customer interaction and usage data is utilized.

details.purpose: Solely for service improvement, transaction fulfillment, and customer support.
details.sharing_status: Data is never sold or shared with third parties for marketing purposes.
details.data_retention: Transaction records are stored for 7 years for compliance purposes; support chat logs for 1 year.

policies.agent_response_template: We use your data only to fulfill your orders and improve our service. Your data is never sold to third parties.

policies.description: Rules for handling high-risk private information.

details.prohibited_collection: Full credit card numbers, CVV codes, government ID numbers.
details.account_security: Passwords are encrypted and not visible to any employee or AI agent.
details.support_verification: Agents will only ask for Order IDs, email addresses, and the last 4 digits of a payment method for verification.

policies.agent_response_template: For security, neither I nor a human agent will ever ask for your full credit card number or password. We only require your Order ID and email to verify your identity.

policies.description: Conditions under which a customer account may be suspended.

grounds_for_suspension: Fraudulent activity (e.g., unauthorized chargebacks or bulk reselling)
details.reinstatement: Suspensions are reviewed after 30 days upon customer appeal.

policies.agent_response_template: Accounts are subject to immediate suspension for fraudulent activity or violation of our service standards.
